posts.title: Teaching women in Africa coding while studying in California
posts.description: Gloria Tumushabe, a Ugandan, is putting her two degrees in computer science to good use. While finishing her Master's in California during the COVID-19 pandemic.

posts.title: Developing farming tech to target weeds and reduce herbicide usage
posts.description: Jen Selby is a Machine Learning Engineer at Blue River Technology, a company specializing in computer vision and robotics. It develops farm machinery.

posts.title: Blending fashion and tech while being a Black Cosplay role model
posts.description: Ginger Burton adored Sailor Moon, the anime character, as a child and loved playing with Barbies. Her love of fashion and design led her to pursue fashion, Sailor Moon.

posts.title: Helping to coordinate the COVID-19 healthcare response in her community
posts.description: Coty Snider, a public health nurse based in the Kitchener-Waterloo region of Canada, talks about being part of the team which is coordinating the COVID-19 healthcare response

posts.title: Promoting Gaming and Game Design as the Skills of the Future...For Everyone
posts.description: JP van Seventer, Managing Director of Dutch Game Garden in The Netherlands, explains his work helping gaming startups and independent game developers create successful companies.

posts.title: Using tech and discarded bananas to develop new food products in Brazil
posts.description: Fabricio Goulart is a Brazilian chef/entrepreneur who is passionate about reimagining food production to create less food waste. He has combined his background in food services, IT and business to launch
